text:
NOW MORE THAN EVER,

MEDECINS SANS FRONTIERES DOCTORS WITHOUT BORDERS

Around the world, people are caught in crisis. Hospitals bombed, families displaced, and children facing starvation.

Now more than ever, we need to act.

Doctors Without Borders is on the ground in more than 75 countries around the world providing medical care, delivering aid, and saving lives.

Now more than ever, compassion matters. Now more than ever, our patients need us, and we need you.

SOUTH SUDAN 2025 © PAULA CASADO ee meCAB ry
